case.state: {megumi}Ah! Sachi-san! It's our anniversary today, isn't it?<hr>{sachi} Ah! it is! We'll celebrate after this game, okay?
{megumi} Oh, ~player~, don't you know? All the best things happen on the roof...

{sachi} Ah! I didn't expect to see you so soon! Thank you for inviting us to this table.{!reset} <hr>{megumi} Yuna's a little bit rough around the edges right now, but I'm sure she'll smooth out with a little extra development! Thank you for playing with her!{!reset}
... Is it just me, or am I getting an odd feeling about her? <hr> {sachi} Don't worry, Yuna-chan, I am, too. There's... something off about her...{!reset}
{sachi} Oh my! Her name is Yuri? I wonder if that's some sort of Alias? {!reset} <hr> I'm not sure, but I will be sure to ask about that...
Oh? There's... some men here... excuse me, I wasn't expecting to play with men tonight...
Wha- I'm the only girl here?! That... can't be right, can it?<hr>{sachi} It appears as such, Yuna-chan... I think it's best that we bring our "A-game," as it were.

{megumi} Wha- There's only men here?! Oh... if they take one look at Sachi-san-{!reset}
(Hey, Megumi, calm down! I'm just as shocked as you are, but we need level heads now more than ever.)
Alright. Everybody ready to go? I sure am...
This is a case that should play when Yuna goes into bossmode. It sets the same persistent marker should Yuna end up on a table with other men.
{megumi} Hey, isn't it a little rude to go through Yuna's character file?
{sachi} Megumi, this might be a developer actually wanting to write lines to her...
{megumi} Well... fine, but don't try to hit on Sachi-san. THIS ESPECIALLY GOES FOR YOU, AMY AND MIKO!

{sachi}(Hmm... I think exchanging all of these is the best option...)
(I was just about to say the same thing, Sachi-san...)
Sigh... I'm going to have to request a whole new set, please.

{sachi}(Ah! That's a very good hand, isn't it?){!reset}
(Indeed it is...) Oh, um... no cards, please.
(Nice...) Oh, no cards, dealer.

{sachi} (Yuna, try going with ~cards.text~ card~cards.ifPlural(s|)~.){!reset}
(Got it.)

{sachi} (Hmm... ask the dealer for ~cards.text~ card~cards.ifPlural(s|)~, Yuna.){!reset}
(I was just about to suggest the same thing, Sachi-san.)
Hmm... ~cards.text~ card~cards.ifPlural(s|)~, please.
I'll go with ~cards.text~ card~cards.ifPlural(s|)~, please.
Let's go with ~cards.text~ card~cards.ifPlural(s|)~, dealer.

{megumi}(Hmm... Something tells me that you want ~cards.text~ card~cards.ifPlural(s|)~, Yuna!{!reset}
(Hmm... Yeah, it looks like I'll have to do that...)
{megumi}(Ahh... do we go with... no, ~cards.text~ cards~cards.ifPlural(s|)~, Yuna!){!reset}
(Hmm... Can't slip up now, can we?) Dealer, ~cards.text~ card~cards.ifPlural(s|)~, please.
{megumi}Nice one, Yuna! I won't even have to curse anybody this round!{!reset} <hr> Wait, were you going to do that if I lost?
{sachi}These numbers and colors mean you're doing well, right?{!reset} <hr> When they're like this? Yeah.
{sachi}You're not showing them any mercy, Yuna-san!{!reset} <hr> No such thing as mercy when you're playing to win.
{megumi}I didn't know you knew how to play poker, Yuna.{!reset} <hr> I learned from the best... That being a mobile gacha game.

Hey, if I win, I'll, um... cook a meal for everybody here. How's that sound?
{megumi}Trying to trick everybody into throwing? Devious, Yuna.
{megumi}You could've pulled this out earlier, Yuna!{!reset} <hr> You know I don't decide what cards I get, right?

{sachi}Nicely put together, Yuna-san... though the prospect of having to strip was exciting...{!reset}
Sachi-san, please...
{megumi}Quick, Yuna! Distract them!{!reset} <hr> Huh? Why? Don't do something careless!
This sure beats being stuck on the roof all the time, huh? <hr> {sachi}Indeed. That being said, I can't help but wonder what's happening at Shirojo right now...{!reset}
If the broadcast club ever found out about this, they would have blasted it all over Shirojo... They're not very good at keeping things secret.

{sachi}What will you do after this, Yuna-san?{!reset}
(Well, first, I'll tell Hina what happened. She seemed pretty curious before I left.)
I'm glad you guys got to see some new sights. Haunting the same school for all that time must have been pretty boring. <hr> {megumi} It wasn't boring so long as I had my Sachi-san!

{megumi}Psst, Yuna. You want me to cheat by looking at everybody else's hands?{!reset}
(I don't think that would be very useful here.)
{sachi}How is your third year going, Yuna-san?{!reset} <hr> Pretty good, I'd say. I think it's going less well for Youka. She barely got through our second year.
(Okay, I can make this work. Just bide my time, and hope nobody has anything better...)
{megumi}All eyes are on you, Yuna. Try not to screw this up.{!reset} <hr> Yeah, that doesn't make me nervous at all.
{sachi}Are you prepared for another loss, Yuna-san?{!reset} <hr> Y-Yeah, just... give me a moment...
{megumi}On a scale of one to ten, how does this compare to your first time?{!reset} <hr> D-Don't ask me to rate it!

{sachi}What happened to those senpai of yours, Yuna-san?{!reset} <hr> Matsuri and Miyu-senpai, from the track team? They're off to college. Can't imagine what they get up to now that they have a dorm together...
{megumi}You've gotten naked in front of your girlfriend, Yuna. You can take it here too.{!reset} <hr> That's different and you know it!
Well... at the very least, less clothes should help me deal with the heat out here...

{sachi} It's okay, Yuna. Think of it as getting ready to go swimming!{!reset}
(Well yeah, but I didn't bring any swimwear!)

{megumi} You know, Yuna... that water looks nice and refreshing, and you're looking particularly sweaty...{!reset}
(Megumi!)
Hmm... well, nothing too major yet...
{megumi} Hmm... I guess you have to get ready to strip, don't you...{!reset}
{sachi} Well, Yuna-san, what matters is staying ahead of the competition, right? {!reset}
Well... I can't get too mad at this stage of the game...
{megumi} Oy, is the dealer really trying to make us lose this early? {!reset}
{megumi} You know, I think the dealer is asking for a curse at this point... {!reset}
Huh. You know, I'm surprised I've managed to keep my top layers for so long...
Well... these could only stay on for so long...
{megumi} I'd get mad at the dealer for giving us bad cards... but Yuna's pretty far ahead, anyway.{!reset}
{sachi} Ah... it seems that bad cards like these were bound to hit us sooner rather than later...
Ugh, I really do not need this hand right now...
... Of course I have to get this hand now of all times...

Sigh... I'm sorry, you two...
{Sachi} It's fine, Yuna. It was inevitable that we'd be like this eventually...{!reset}

{megumi}Hey, dealer! Do you want us to lose or something?{!reset}
(To be honest, I'm inclined to agree...)
{sachi} You know, there's a certain thrill in being this exposed, isn't there? {!reset} <hr> {megumi} Heh, heh... and now we're about to get more exposed, aren't we? {!reset}

(Anyway, Sachi-san, are you ready to start looking for potential couples?)
{sachi} Ah, of course, Yuna-san. I'm always ready to spread the Yuritopia!
{sachi} Ah, ~player~, if it's not too much trouble, I need to ask you a favor. Ensure that Tomoko loses, and finishes forfeiting, before Megumin must forfeit.{!reset}
{sachi} Oh, by the way, Miko-sama, I've been meaning to ask, what is the strange device sitting on your neck?{!reset}
Well... a friend of mine found this place first, and she brought me along on her next visit. I've been frequenting this place ever since...
Sachi... do you think she's serious?<hr>{sachi} This sounds like a trap, but it doesn't appear as though she's lying. ~player~, I am afraid you will have to throw the game.

{sachi}{small} Ah, that. See, when we were still at Shirojo, we often looked on in vain as we saw girls who couldn't reciprocate their feelings towards other girls.{!reset} <hr> {megumi}{small} It was always our dream to help these poor girls realize their true feelings for each other, and thus create a Yuritopia! Where all the girls could safely be gay!{!reset}

{sachi} Ah, well, the short version of the story is that I died from an accident before the war, about eighty years before I met Yuna and fifty years before I met...{!reset} <hr>{megumi} Me! I... died from a cold that turned into pneumonia...{!reset}

{megumi}{small} Mostly? It's trying to make sure that women in the inventory realize their attraction to other girls, but our attempts so far have been a bit hit or miss...{!reset}<hr> {sachi}{small} Otherwise, we've been honing our ghostly abilities that were enhanced by our First Time. Namely, my Yuri radar and Megumi's curses.{!reset}
{sachi} Ah... well... I personally wouldn't mind, but you may have a hard time trying to convince Megumi of anything of that nature.<hr>{megumi} And the answer is a resounding no!{!reset}
{sachi} Ah, wouldn't you like to know? Truth be told, my mother straightened out my hair like this the day before I died. It's entirely stayed this way for as long as I've been a ghost...{!reset}
{sachi} That... I honestly couldn't tell you. I can assure you, however, that both of us recieved proper funerals...{!reset}

{sachi} By the way, Yuna, I've been meaning to ask, how have Seina and Miki been doing?{!reset}
(As far as I know, they're doing well enough. Miki is in college, but they still make contact occasionally.)

{megumi} So... Yuna, tell me, how has the broadcast trio been since we left?{!reset} <hr> Ah, those three? Last I heard, they all went into college to study broadcasting. Sasa and Umi are also going strong, as far as I know...{!reset}
{sachi} While we're here, Yuna, can you tell us how Youka and Aki have been?{!reset} <hr> Ah, yes. Youka only barely managed to graduate from Shirojo, and she's currently living with Aki.

{sachi} Fufufufu... You're really surprised you're talking to a ghost? {!reset}
{megumi} You should know that there is always more than meets the eye, Meia...{!reset}
Oh, trust me, Meia, it kinda shocked me when I started talking to these two as well, but you get used to it...
{sachi} Oh, no, nothing of the sort. It is true that our homeland, Japan, is still quite mistrustful of women like Megumi and I, but we weren't actually murdered because of it...{!reset}
In short, no. Megumi and Sachi-san died nearly fifty years apart for entirely separate reasons. That being said, Meia, you're right, it's really tough to be a lesbian in Japan.

{megumi} Oh... I assure you, Jura, we are very... very dead...
{sachi} Oh come now, let's not be too mean to her, she's already very distressed...{!reset}
Oh, these two? Yeah, they're ghosts. Don't worry, it shocked me when I was able to start speaking to them as well, but you get used to it...
{sachi} I don't particularly care for your rude language, Revy, but yes, we are ghosts, and yes, we are playing along with Yuna. This includes stripping with her.{!reset}
{megumi} What the- Hey, what gives you the right to say mean things about Sachi-san and I? {!reset}
Wha- Hey, you're talking about my friends here! Would it kill you to show a little respect?
{megumi} Hey! Don't call us... actually, yeah... we are kinda voyeurs...{!reset} <hr>Now you know how I felt when I first met you!

Well... the only card game I was okay at before I came here was Koi-Koi of all things, but Megumi and Sachi-san taught me how to play poker after I came here. As it turns out, I'm pretty good at it...
Ah, well... I met these two back during my second year at Shirojo, and after a little talking, eventually roped me into their grand plan to get all the possible couples at my school together...
{sachi} Oh, I assure you, I am very, very real...{!reset} <hr>{megumi} And what of you? This isn't your first time seeing a ghost, is it?{!reset}
Ah, these two? Don't worry, they're friendly, as long as you don't get on their bad side... <hr> {megumi} Or else I will unleash a fury of curses the likes of which you have never seen.{!reset}

{megumi} And what do you propose we play, hm? There's not much else here rather than strip poker. Or blackjack. Or hookers.{!reset} <hr> {sachi} Don't be mean, Megumi, she's only trying to get used to our presence.{!reset}
Ah, well, I kinda just randomly met these two on the roof of my school.<hr> {megumi} And was that flirting with Sachi-san? I have no qualms against cursing you for that, Prince!{!reset}

{sachi} Ah, I guess we could only have kept this up for so long...{!reset}
(Hey, Sachi-San, it's fine. We've still got a good lead.)

{megumi} Aw, really? I was sure that was a good enough hand...{!reset}
(Hey! At least we're still in the lead.)
Well, I guess I can't be too mad about this...
Well... I guess I could only have had this many layers for so long. At least I'm still ahead...
Okay... that's fine, I'm still ahead of the group... while taking off my underwear...
Well, there went my chances to keep my underwear on...

{megumi} Ah, the hollowest of victories, isn't it? You do realize we're down to our skivvies, right?{!reset}
(At least we're in the lead! I'd like to try and see you play sometime...)

{sachi} Ah, it seems as though we're going to have to lose our underdrawers, anyway. What a shame...{!reset}
(Look on the bright side, Sachi-san. At least we're not... forfeiting.)
At the very least, I'm glad Ano isn't here. She would not let me hear the end of it...
And... I lost. <hr>{megumi} That's a particularly loaded term, don't you think?!{!reset}

{sachi} And there we go, down for the count...{!reset}
(You realize it's still anybody's game, right?)
And the loser is... oh, it's me...
{sachi} And the loser is... wait, it's us?{!reset} <hr>Looks like it...

{megumi} And the lucky stripper is... OH COME ON, REALLY?!{!reset}
Well, it's not like we-... I'm losing, by any means...
Sigh... And here I thought I just might get through this round without having to bare it all...
Well... the game's not over yet!

{megumi} Yuna, tell me, how is it that we're doing so poorly this time?{!reset}
(I don't know! Try taking it up with the dealer... or cursing them, I don't care.)
Oh boy... something tells me that I'm not going to be without my main layers for long...
Wha- now? But I'm already running really far behind!

{megumi} Ah... but... we're already so behind... dealer, can't we escape having to strip once? Pretty please?{!reset}
{sachi} I don't think your crocodile tears will work on them, Megumi... {!reset}
{megumi} Aw... dammit...
Well, this isn't so bad...<hr>{megumi} I know! You get to strip naked in front of strangers!{!reset} <hr>Okay, maybe it is...
{sachi} Well, if we can't beat them, we might as well embrace it! You ready, Megumi?{!reset} <hr> {megumi} Yes!{!reset}

(Sachi-san, are you sure she has an emotion other than "insufferably horny?")<hr>{sachi} Well... I'm afraid not. She means well, however, and she hasn't tried to touch us without our consent...{!reset}

{sachi} Well, I guess it wouldn't be any fun if we didn't strip with you, Yuna. Megumi, how about we remove our ribbons, first?{!reset} <hr> {megumi} Agreed... but Yuna-chan shouldn't lose again.{!reset}
(Well, I guess we know the drill at this point. One, two, three...)
(Well... this is going to be the first time I've revealed my breasts to... anybody but Hina... Alright you two. One... two... three...)

(Well, I guess it's time we go at it again. You starting with your ribbons, again?)
{sachi} Of course, Yuna-san. Let's see how far we get this time...){!reset}
(Alright, so... you mentioned being able to take your clothes off, what else did you two gain with your... {small} first time?){!reset}
{megumi} At the very least, we're finally going to be somewhat even... {!reset} <hr> {sachi} Heh... not that there's too much to take off at this point.
Well... here goes nothing, I guess...

{megumi} Well... this feels unfair... I'm losing my belt, and now you have to lose your shirts... {!reset}
(It's fine, Megumi. A quirk like this was bound to happen eventually...)
Well, I guess the vest is going off first, then...
Well... at least this isn't going to be the first time I've gone topless in front of somebody...
{megumi} At the very least, if you lose, Yuna, someone will be very excited to watch you...{!reset} <hr> Heh... let's hope it doesn't come to that, okay?

(Wait... eh... Huh? But... I thought you couldn't take off any of your clothes?)
{megumi}Heh, heh, heh... you should know that we were given many abilities by our First Time, Yuna... {!reset}

(You know, Sachi, I'm surprised that bras were popular in your time...)
{sachi} They weren't, but as a ghost, I can actually wear any clothes I want to. I picked this set after I saw it shortly after arriving here.
(Speaking of not much left to take off, I'm honestly starting to get angry that I've lost this much. I've had fun so far, but now? The gloves are coming off!){sachi} That's the spirit, Yuna!{!reset}
Well done, you've managed to get me topless. Happy? <hr> {megumi} And don't say yes, 'cause then I'll curse you! {!reset}

{sachi} Ah... well, we can strip off our clothes, my Yuri Radar became much stronger, and Megumi can curse people now!{!reset}
(Megumi can actually... oh no...)

(Alright, you two. Are you ready for sudden death?)
{sachi} Given that the both of us are already dead, let's see how long we can survive like this! {!reset}
{megumi} And if not... I'd like to rate your technique, Yuna...{!reset}
Alright... Bobobo is down one... you know, I think his hairstyle is starting to grow on me-
{sachi} Ah, Takatoshi. Something tells me you're not the only person here out of time...{!reset}
{megumi} Hmm... I don't know what it is, but something tells me you're from Sachi-san's time, aren't you?{!reset}
... Huh, it's not every day I see a person this tall. Much less a man. Where's Koprulu, exactly?
{megumi} Huh... it's not every day I see a giant stroll in. Koprulu's some western nation I've never head of, right?{!reset}
It's ~name~'s turn... I guess. <hr> {megumi}Geez, Yuna, no need to sound so enthusiatic.{!reset}

{sachi}I'll admit, I've been quite curious...{!reset}
{megumi}N-Not that curious, right, Sachi-san...?{!reset}
Before I met these two, I would think that every girl at Shirojo wanted to see a guy strip. Now...
{sachi}P-Pay attention, Yuna-san...{!reset} <hr> Yeah, I-I'm trying...
{megumi}Masturbating while a guy strips, and when you already have a girlfriend...{!reset} <hr> Y-You're one to talk...!

{sachi} (Aha!) {!reset}
(Huh? Found one, Sachi?)
{sachi}(Indeed, Yuna-chan! I think there's some potential here!)

{megumi} Well... someone has come in rather forward, hasn't she?{!reset}
Ah, I apologize for my friend, here. She... can be a little bit of a brat sometimes.
{sachi} By the way, Meia, I've been meaning to ask, what is the purpose of your eyepiece? Is it some kind of "Pee-cee" I haven't seen before?{!reset}

(Hmm... It's hard to get some kind of read on her. What say you, Sachi-san?)<hr> {sachi} (She's honestly hard to pin down. Her emotions are going all over the place, but I can tell you that she's very, very bisexual.){!reset}
{megumi}Excited, Yuna?{!reset} <hr> Well, maybe a little...
{sachi}We've seen other girls strip, but usually they're taking the clothes off of each other.{!reset}
{megumi}You just kicked that girl's butt. Think she's mad at you?{!reset} <hr> Well... All's fair in love and... strip poker.

{sachi}Now's the perfect time to ask if she's ever been interested in another girl.{!reset}
(Uh, are you sure about that?)
{sachi}It seems like just yesterday that we were doing this to each other, Megumi.{!reset} <hr> {megumi} That was the greatest day of my life!{!reset}

{megumi}Don't miss the main event, Yuna!{!reset}
I- hn! -suppose so?
{sachi}Maybe this will be helpful, Yuna-san.{!reset} <hr> Y-Yeah, maybe...
{megumi}A tie! Wait, does that mean both of them have to-{!reset}<hr>(Megumi! They don't!)
Huh. I sometimes forget just how rare this is.
{sachi} Ah! A tie! How interesting!
Wait, wha... Planet?! In space?!
{megumi} Um... planet? What exactly did you smoke before coming into the inventory?

{megumi}Tell that guy to hurry up, Yuna!{!reset}
(Tell him yourself.)
So, uh... where are you from, ~name~?
{sachi}It's been many years since I've seen a man up close, so even this much is quite exciting!{!reset}

{megumi}The best part about an all girls school is not having to see this.{!reset}
(Don't be mean, Megumi. He's here to have fun too.)

{sachi}What are you thinking about, Yuna-san?{!reset}
(Just what I was going to cook for Hina when I get home...)
Guys, ~name~ just took something off... At least, I think he did...
{megumi}Sachi-san...{!reset} <hr> {sachi}Oh, Megumi...{!reset} <hr> H-Hey, don't forget about the game...

{sachi} (Yuna, Megumi, before we go any further, I should let you know one thing. Raynor... is carrying a lot of pain in his heart. Be careful about asking about his love life.){!reset} <hr> (Got it.)

{sachi} (Yuna, Megumi, before we go any further, I should let you know, Raynor is carrying a lot of pain in his heart. Keep this in mind as we go further...){!reset}
{megumi} (Ah, is that so? That's... oh boy, you normally never say that about other people...)

(Quick, Megumi. What do guys like to talk about?)
{megumi}How should I know?{!reset}
{megumi}Next!{!reset}
{megumi}So, Yuna... are you excited to see ~name~ beat his meat?{!reset} <hr> Megumi! Please don't say it like that.
Do you like baseball? Maybe soccer? Sorry, I don't talk to a lot of guys.
{sachi}Try complimenting him, Yuna-san.{!reset} <hr> Umm... good job?
{megumi}Hey, Yuna... What did that guy just take off...?{!reset} <hr> Huh? I don't remember...
Nngh... I can barely focus right now...
{sachi} Ah... is that so? Well, I can certainly appreciate the value of an heirloom... {!reset}

{megumi}You feeling anything yet, Yuna?{!reset}
(Megumi, it's just her ~clothing~. Why would I?)
{megumi}You'd better not try to seduce my Sachi-san with ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~!{!reset} <hr> {sachi}Megumi, it's only ~clothing.ifPlural(|a)~ ~clothing~.
{sachi}I've rarely seen clothing aside from school uniforms. That's a wonderful design, ~name~.{!reset}
(Now that I think about it, maybe I should start bringing something small, too.)
{megumi}I-I'm not paying attention to you or anything... But you can do better than that...{!reset}
Guess I'll have to leave this to my imagination...
Well... this is mildly awkward...
{megumi} So... Yuna, how does it feel to watch ~name~ take off ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ nice ~clothing~ in your birthday suit?{!reset}
{sachi} This is... honestly a little disheartening... {!reset}
{sachi} Who knew that our first defeat would be this... sound...{!reset}
{megumi} Come on, Yuna! Why didn't you win against ~name~ more? She could have been stripping her underwear by now! {!reset}
(Ahh... and here I wish ~name~ was going to take off more than just her ~clothing~...)

{sachi}I would love to wear something with the design of ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ ~clothing~.{!reset}
(You know, Sachi-san, that might actually be possible here.)
Try not to lose track of where you put ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~, ~name~. <hr> {megumi}It'd be a shame if somebody moved it while you weren't looking...{!reset}
{sachi}Next time, perhaps you could have another woman remove ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~.{!reset} <hr> Just don't expect it to be me.

{sachi}Did you see anything exciting, Yuna-san?{!reset}
(Nothing that I haven't seen at Shirojo.)
(Sachi-san and Megumi have seen plenty of girls strip. Wonder how this compares.)
{megumi}W-Wait, she's taking off ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~, and we're doing this? How did you mess up that bad, Yuna?!{!reset}
{sachi}I'm sure that there are better things to come...{!reset}
Well, this game will be over eventually, right?

Well... this kinda blows. {small}I'm really sorry, you two...{!reset}
{sachi} Don't be. I actually quite enjoyed losing!{!reset}

{megumi} My, ~name~ taking off her ~clothing~ has to be really turning you on, doesn't it, Yuna?{!reset}
(Don't patronize me! I didn't know luck would be on ~name~'s side this round!)
Well, nothing I can do but watch at this point... While I'm entirely naked...
{sachi}Have you seen a man do this before, Yuna-san?{!reset} <hr> Well, the only man I really know is my dad, so... no.
{sachi}Ah, it would seem we're entering the exciting part of the game now!{!reset} <hr> Yeah, as exciting as a guy taking off his clothes can be.
{megumi}You'd better not look at Sachi-san, ~name~. You can stare at Yuna instead.{!reset} <hr> Don't offer me up like that!
Is it normal for guys to wear ~clothing~~clothing.ifPlural(|s)~ like that?

{sachi}Women loving each other is fantastic, but... maybe there's potential in men as well?{!reset}
Sachi-san! Don't become a fujoshi!
W-Well, I'm sure some people enjoy this...
{megumi}At least he took the focus off of you, Yuna.{!reset} <hr> Y-Yeah...
{sachi}Don't feel embarrassed about your body, ~name~. ~Player~ seems interested, if nothing else!{!reset}
What's he gonna take off next...? <hr> {megumi}Who cares?{!reset}
{sachi}An excellent choice, ~name~... Oh, yes, right there...{!reset}
Huh. So that's what guys look like without ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ on.

{megumi}Yuna! Show that guy what he gets for looking at my Sachi-san!{!reset}
Wait, guys aren't even allowed to look at her?
If I keep winning, it'll be the first time I've seen another guy naked like this...
I might have preferred a table with more girls, but you don't seem like a bad guy, ~name~.

(Have you ever spied on girls doing this, Megumi?)
{megumi}Why would I do that when I have my Sachi-san?{!reset}
{sachi}Taking off your own clothes is well and good, but isn't it so much more exciting to have somebody else do it?{!reset}

{sachi} Mmm... how are you holding up, Yuna-san...{!reset}
(Pretty well, to be honest. I'm... more into this than I thought I'd be...)
Ahh... Playing this game made me more pent-up than I realized...

{megumi} Yuna... You're looking particularly wet... I take it that you're into this?{!reset}
(I mean... as much as I don't want to admit it... {small}yes...){!reset}

Fuck, I needed this...
Ahn... ah...
{megumi} S-Sachi-san... I... ah...{!reset}<hr>{sachi}Ah... I am, too, Megumi... y-you're so cute...{!reset}

H-HINAAA! <hr> {sachi}M-M-MEGUMI!{!reset} <hr> {megumi}AH! AH! MMAGH! SACHI-SAN!
Well... that was oddly refreshing. <hr>{sachi} Indeed, Yuna-san! I kinda want to go again!{!reset} <hr> {megumi} Oh, why don't we do it to each other next time?{!reset}

{megumi} Yuna, why aren't you standing up? You know the sand is going to seriously mess your parts up.
Well... this is awkward...
{megumi} Say... Yuna, you've finished, but nobody else has gotten naked... are you some kind of exhebitioni-{!reset} <hr> Megumi!
So... ~player~, do you come here often?

{megumi} You know, Sachi-san, if you wanted to go again, I wouldn't be making any complaints about it in the slightest...<hr>{sachi} Is that so? Well, let's wait until after the game is over, okay?{!reset}

Well... uh... I don't have much to talk about right now, really. Do you?
Alright! Another easy victory in the books...
Hmm... I would have preferred a perfect game, but no matter. Great game, everybody.
Oy... that was close. Still, I'm glad we pulled off the win in the end...
Phew... Okay, that was too close... (Now where the hell is my bra?)
Oy... that was a closer game than what I wanted to deal with. Still, good game, ~target~.
Well ~player~, you just managed to hand me my first ever loss. In that case... umm... here, take this old trophy I had lying around in my purse just for this occasion.
Oy... This isn't even my first time losing, and now I had to lose to ~player~... Still, good game. Here, uh... have this cooking trophy that I keep around in my purse for some reason.

Sigh... Okay, I'm really sorry about this. I know this isn't the first time, and I've let you down spectacularly. {sachi} It's okay, Yuna. I know this game is heavily reliant on luck, anyways. Don't be too hard on yourself.{!reset}
